Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables the import of locally installed mods (Mods in the user/Mods folder).
Enables the import of subscribed asset packs.
Deletes all unused files in the CustomAssets folder.

Deletes all imported asset packs from your game directory. Please manually sync assets to re-import them. You will need to restart the game after syncing assets. If you don't choose to sync manually, you will have to restart the game **TWICE**.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetI:
Are you sure you want to delete all imported asset packs? 
Please manually sync assets to re-import them. You will need to restart the game after syncing assets. If you don't choose to sync manually, you will have to restart the game **TWICE**.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Copies all the downloaded asset packs to your game directory again. This will overwrite any existing assets.
Options.WARNING[AssetPacksManager.AssetI: Are you sure you want to re-import all asset packs?
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[AssetPacksMan: Enables additional log messages for debugging purposes.
Automatically hides Asset Importer Notifications after 30 seconds.
